title: Project Creation with Valid Inputs
description: Verify that a user can successfully create a new project by providing valid name and description, and is redirected to the dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to project creation page
Input valid project name and description
Submit the project creation form
Verify loading spinner appears during creation
Verify project is created successfully and user is redirected to project dashboard
Verify new project appears in project list with correct status and details

title: Project Creation Input Validation and Error Handling
description: Check that invalid project inputs trigger proper validation errors and prevent submission.

steps.description: Navigate to project creation page
Leave project name empty and input description
Attempt to submit the form
Verify validation error for project name is displayed
Input project name but leave description empty
Attempt to submit the form
Verify validation error for project description is displayed

title: Multi-Agent State Synchronization via WebSocket
description: Validate that the multi-agent state management system synchronizes agent states correctly over WebSocket.

steps.description: Navigate to project dashboard
Verify WebSocket connection status shows as connected
Trigger multiple agent state updates concurrently
Verify agent cards update in real-time with correct status
Verify timestamp-based conflict resolution works correctly

title: Dashboard Real-Time Updates and Visualization
description: Ensure dashboard reflects real-time multi-agent states, task statuses, and blocker panels accurately.

steps.description: Navigate to project dashboard
Verify overview tab displays project progress correctly
Verify agent cards show current status and task count
Verify blockers panel displays active blockers
Wait for WebSocket state update events
Verify all dashboard panels update in real-time

title: Human-in-the-Loop Blocker Creation and Resolution
description: Verify blocker creation, display, filtering, sorting, and resolution workflow.

steps.description: Navigate to project dashboard
Create a SYNC priority blocker from agent
Verify blocker appears in blockers panel
Click on blocker to open resolution modal
Verify blocker details display correctly
Enter resolution text and submit
Verify blocker is marked resolved and removed from active list

title: Hierarchical Task Management Display
description: Ensure task tree displays nested tasks with collapsible views and status badges.

steps.description: Navigate to project dashboard
Verify task tree displays with hierarchical structure
Click to expand a parent task
Verify nested child tasks become visible
Click to collapse the parent task
Verify child tasks are hidden
Verify status badges display correct colors for task states

title: Code Review Panel Auto-Updates
description: Validate code review panel updates automatically upon receiving WebSocket review events.

steps.description: Navigate to project dashboard
Trigger review_approved WebSocket event
Verify review panel opens automatically
Verify overall review score displays with color coding
Verify findings list shows items with severity badges
Verify file paths and line numbers are clickable

title: Lint Quality Tracking and Visualization
description: Test lint quality trend chart displays error/warning counts with auto-refresh.

steps.description: Navigate to project dashboard lint quality section
Verify chart displays 7-day error and warning trends
Verify linter badges show for ruff and ESLint
Filter by specific linter type
Verify chart updates to show only selected linter results
Verify error counts display in red and warnings in yellow

title: Discovery Q&A and PRD Generation Workflow
description: Validate discovery Q&A interaction and PRD generation through the dashboard.

steps.description: Create new project and navigate to discovery interface
Answer discovery questions from Lead Agent
Verify progress indicator updates with completion percentage
Complete all discovery questions
Verify PRD is generated successfully
Open PRD viewer modal
Verify PRD markdown renders correctly with all sections

title: Session Lifecycle Persistence and Resumption
description: Verify session state saves and restores correctly with accurate progress visualization.

steps.description: Create project and progress through multiple tasks
Close browser and restart session
Verify session status panel shows last session summary
Verify progress percentage displays correctly
Verify next actions list shows pending tasks
Verify active blockers are restored

title: API Client Response and Type Safety
description: Ensure all API endpoints respond within performance thresholds with correct data types.

steps.description: Navigate to project dashboard
Trigger API calls to projects endpoint
Verify response time is under 500ms
Verify response data structure matches expected types
Trigger API calls to agents, tasks, blockers endpoints
Verify all endpoints return valid typed responses

title: Quality Gates Enforcement
description: Test that tasks cannot be marked complete unless all quality gates pass.

steps.description: Navigate to task with failing lint results
Attempt to mark task as complete
Verify task remains incomplete with quality gate failure message
Fix lint errors and re-run quality checks
Verify quality gates now pass
Mark task as complete
Verify task transitions to completed status

title: Chat Interface Real-Time Messaging
description: Verify chat interface supports real-time messaging with markdown rendering and typing indicators.

steps.description: Open chat interface in dashboard
Type and send a message with markdown syntax
Verify message appears with markdown rendered correctly
Wait for agent response
Verify typing indicator appears before message
Verify agent message displays in chat history
Verify auto-scroll to latest message works

title: ChatInterface Component Message Display
description: Verify ChatInterface displays message history, handles user input, and shows agent status correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to page containing ChatInterface component
Verify message history displays with correct timestamps
Type a message in the input field
Verify input field accepts text and shows character count
Submit message with empty input
Verify validation prevents empty message submission
Submit valid message
Verify message appears immediately with optimistic UI update
Verify agent status indicator shows online/offline state

title: ErrorBoundary Component Error Handling
description: Verify ErrorBoundary catches component errors, displays error UI, and provides retry functionality.

steps.description: Navigate to page with component wrapped in ErrorBoundary
Trigger a component error by providing invalid props
Verify error boundary catches error and displays fallback UI
Verify error message displays to user
Verify retry button is visible and accessible
Click retry button
Verify component attempts to re-render
Verify error is logged to console for debugging

title: Context Memory Item List with Pagination
description: Verify ContextItemList displays context items with pagination, filtering by tier (HOT/WARM/COLD), and handles loading/error states.

steps.description: Navigate to context memory panel for an agent
Verify context items list displays with 20 items per page
Verify each item shows type, content preview, tier badge, and timestamp
Click on HOT tier filter
Verify list filters to show only HOT tier items
Click pagination next button
Verify page 2 loads with next 20 items
Click pagination previous button
Verify returns to page 1

title: Context Tier Distribution Chart
description: Verify ContextTierChart displays tier distribution with token counts and percentages.

steps.description: Navigate to context memory panel
Verify chart displays three bars for HOT, WARM, COLD tiers
Verify each bar shows item count and token count
Verify percentage labels display on bars
Verify HOT tier bar displays in red color
Verify WARM tier bar displays in yellow color
Verify COLD tier bar displays in blue color
Verify legend displays with tier definitions

title: Lint Results Table Display
description: Verify LintResultsTable displays lint errors and warnings with proper badges and styling.

steps.description: Navigate to lint quality section of dashboard
Verify table displays with columns for linter, file, line, severity, message
Verify ruff linter badge displays for Python files
Verify ESLint linter badge displays for JavaScript/TypeScript files
Verify error severity displays in red text
Verify warning severity displays in yellow text
Verify file paths are clickable links

Verify score displays in green if approved (â‰¥80)

title: Review Score Chart Breakdown
description: Verify ReviewScoreChart displays score breakdown with progress bars for code quality, security, performance, and maintainability.

Verify overall score displays as large number with color coding
Verify score breakdown section shows four aspect scores
Verify code quality progress bar displays with percentage
Verify security progress bar displays with percentage
Verify performance progress bar displays with percentage
Verify maintainability progress bar displays with percentage
Verify summary text displays review status message

description: Verify ReviewFindingsList displays findings with 5 severity levels, 6 category icons, file paths, line numbers, and suggestions.

Verify findings list displays with items in order
Verify critical severity displays with red badge
Verify high severity displays with orange badge

Verify low severity displays with blue badge
Verify info severity displays with gray badge

title: Timestamp Utilities Validation and Formatting
description: Verify timestamp utilities correctly parse, validate, compare, and format timestamps with proper NaN/Infinity handling.

steps.description: Navigate to any page displaying timestamps (chat, context items, session status)
Verify timestamps display in human-readable format (e.g., '2 hours ago', 'just now')
Verify ISO 8601 timestamps are parsed correctly
Verify Unix millisecond timestamps are parsed correctly
Verify invalid timestamps (NaN, Infinity, -Infinity) are rejected
Verify negative timestamps are handled correctly
Verify timestamp comparison works for conflict resolution
Verify timestamps update dynamically as time passes
